page.title: 18WIDNES AMENITIES (2)
page.content: { POLICE SERVICE}The new Cheshire Constabulary was officially formed in{ {1957.}The badge adopted in{1966}has two lions in the centre,a sword and two wheatsheafs.There are{1,854}police officers in the Constabulary which is divided into five divisions. { FIRE SERVICE}There are{52}firemen in Widnes and they answer about{1,800 calls a year, a third of which are false alarms. { MUNICIPAL OFFICES}They have 400 phone extensions and two lifts.It was built in{1967}and has eight floors. { THE GENERAL POST OFFICE }There are { {220,000}letters delivered every week.It costs 13p or 17p to send a letter. { THE HEALTH CENTRE }was built in{1936 and has three clinics in the town.They deal with vaccination, hearing tests, medicals,dentistry and chiropody.
